properties.NAME: Bluffs
properties.FACILITY: Community: mid size facility to service population of 40,000 plus
properties.FACILITY_F: Communautaire : installation de taille moyenne assurant des services à 40 000 résidents ou plus.
properties.DESCRIPT_1: Near Lac La Belle, these bluffs overlook Lake Superior and the surrounding forest. This is a short hike with a round trip of just over 2 miles. The trail includes some challenging sections that beginners should watch out for. The short hike is worth it for the view!
